Verses: 1 suththa Irudhayamullavargalaagiya Isravelarukku Dhevan Nallavaraagave Irukkiraar.
2 aanaalum En Kaalgal Thallaadudhalukkum, En Adigal Sarukkudhalukkum Satre Thappitru.
3 dhunmaarkkarin Vaazhvai Naan Kaangaiyil, Veembukkaararaagiya Avargalmel Poraamaikonden.
4 maranabariyandham Avargalukku Idukkangalillai; Avargaludaiya Belan Urudhiyaayirukkiradhu.
5 narar Padum Varuththaththil Agappadaargal; Manushar Adaiyum Ubaadhiyai Adaiyaargal.
6 aagaiyaal Perumai Sarappaniyaippol Avargalaich Sutrikkollum; Kodumai Aadaiyaippol Avargalai Moodikkollum.
7 avargal Kangal Kozhuppinaal Eduppaaip Paarkkiradhu; Avargal Irudhayam Virumbuvadhilum Adhigamaai Nadandherugiradhu.
8 avargal Seerkettuppoi, Agandhaiyaaik Kodumai Pesugiraargal; Irumaappaaip Pesugiraargal.
9 thangal Vaai Vaanamattum Ettappesugiraargal; Avargal Naavu Boomiyengum Ulaavugiradhu.
10 aagaiyaal Avarudaiya Janangal Indha Vazhiyaagave Thirumbugiraargal; Thanneergal Avargalukkup Paripooranamaaich Surandhuvarum.
11 dhevanukku Adhu Eppadith Theriyum? Unnadhamaanavarukku Adhaippatri Arivu Undo? Endru Sollugiraargal.
12 idho, Ivargal Dhunmaarkkar; Ivargal Endrum Sugajeevigalaayirundhu, Aasthiyaip Perugappannugiraargal.
13 naan Virudhaavaagave En Irudhayaththaich Suththampanni, Kutramillaamaiyile En Kaigalaik Kazhuvinen.
14 naaldhorum Naan Vaadhikkappattum, Kaalaidhorum Dhandikkappattum Irukkiren.
15 ivvidhamaaip Pesuven Endru Naan Sonnenaanaal, Idho, Ummudaiya Pillaigalin Sandhadhikkuth Dhurogiyaaven.
16 idhai Ariyumpadikku Yosiththuppaarththen; Naan Dhevanudaiya Parisuththa Sthalaththukkul Piravesiththu,
17 avargal Mudivaik Gavaniththu Unarumalavum, Adhu En Paarvaikku Visanamaayirundhadhu.
18 nichchayamaagave Neer Avargalaich Sarukkalaana Idangalil Niruththi, Paazhaana Idangalil Vizhappannugireer.
19 avargal Oru Nimishaththil Evvalavu Paazhaaippogiraargal! Bayangarangalaal Azhindhu Nirmoolamaagiraargal.
20 niththirai Thelindhavudane Soppanam Ozhivadhupol, Aandavare, Neer Vizhikkumpodhu, Avargal Veshaththai Igazhuveer.
21 ippadiyaaga En Manam Kasandhadhu, En Ullindhiriyangalile Kuththunden.
22 naan Kaariyam Ariyaadha Moodanaanen; Umakku Munbaaga Mirugampolirundhen.
23 aanaalum Naan Eppozhudhum Ummodirukkiren; En Valadhukaiyaip Pidiththuth Thaangugireer.
24 ummudaiya Aalosanaiyinpadi Neer Ennai Nadaththi, Mudivile Ennai Magimaiyil Etrukkolveer.
25 paralogaththil Ummaiyallaamal Enakku Yaar Undu? Poologaththil Ummaith Thavira Enakku Vere Viruppamillai.
26 en Maamsamum En Irudhayamum Maandupogiradhu; Dhevan Endrendraikkum En Irudhayaththin Kanmalaiyum En Pangumaayirukkiraar.
27 idho, Ummaivittuth Dhooramaaippogiravargal Naasamadaivaargal; Ummaivittuch Sorampogira Anaivaraiyum Sangarippeer.
28 enakko, Dhevanai Andikkondiruppadhe Nalam; Naan Umadhu Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Sollivarumpadi Karththaraagiya Aandavarmel En Nambikkaiyai Vaiththirukkiren.
